Title: Requires the New York state health care quality and cost containment commission to issue a report on coverage for chronic Lyme disease
Summary: Requires the New York state health care quality and cost containment commission to issue a report considering the impact on health insurance costs and quality of legislation requiring coverage of long term and chronic Lyme disease and other tick-borne diseases.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to meetings and reports of the New York state health care quality and cost containment commission
